name: hackathon-tidytasks
description: Alder, Maeve, Rory & Brendan's Hackathon Nov. 2017

scripts.electron-compile: rm -rf ./electron/TidyTasks-darwin-x64 && rm -rf ./docs/download && mkdir docs/download && electron-packager docs --out electron --icon electron/app-icon.icns && electron-installer-dmg electron/TidyTasks-darwin-x64/TidyTasks.app TidyTasks --overwrite --out=docs/download

author: Alder Cass, Maeve Goggin, Rory O'Kelly, Brendan Benoit
